roleset.name: Make grave or official

example.name: Make grave
example.text: The visit of the president and his wife to a department store solemnized the Christmas season
example.arg: The visit of the president and his wife to a department store

example.name: make official
example.text: Early colonial unions were predominantly interracial and not solemnized by church or state.

roleset.note: Roleset based on internet search. Added due to parallel expansion of propbank, verbnet, and sense groupings. No verbnet class. No framenet mapping. Framed by Katie.
